title: [Bug]: Sorry, something went wrong, please try again
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

Unable to use team in brower,deb apk or chrome desktop extensions or any browser in my ubuntu 24.04 version

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.12.6

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.In ubuntu 24.04 try to open teams in anywhere
2.After the sign in or sign up page the page changes to Sorry, something went wrong, please try again
3.it will tell to restart or switch to different account but nothing works
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.The teams app or chat page need to be opened
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b7dcdfe7-aba2-46e7-b650-f642cb3f5622)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/08bf96d6-6e8d-42c6-ba01-248fec3dbd99)
